snippet: Eric Lyle Williams, a former justice of the peace, was charged with killing the Kaufman County, Tex., district attorney and an aide.
abstract: Eric Lyle Williams, disgraced Texas justice of the peace, is charged with revenge killings of Kaufman County officials Mark E Hasse and Mike McLelland after they prosecuted theft case against him; is also charged with killing McLelland's wife Cynthia; Williams and wife Kim Lene are charged with capital murder, which could carry death penalty.

byline.original: By LAUREN D'AVOLIO, SERGE F. KOVALESKI and ETHAN BRONNER
byline.contributor: Lauren D’Avolio reported from Kaufman, Tex.; Serge F. Kovaleski from Boston; and Ethan Bronner from New York.

lead_paragraph: Eric Lyle Williams, a former justice of the peace, was charged with killing the Kaufman County, Tex., district attorney and an aide.

headline.seo: Eric Lyle Williams Is Charged in Texas Killings
headline.main: Charges Set in Killings of Officials in Texas
headline.print_headline: Charges Set In Killings Of Officials In Texas
